nodes.text: The New Plympto resistance was the Nosaurian resistance movement on New Plympto against the Yuuzhan Vong during their invasion of the galaxy. It was led by Numa and Alema Rar; the Twi'lek sisters only went into public one at a time, with their lekku hidden, causing the Yuuzhan Vong to believe they were a single Human woman. Kyp's Dozen ran supplies for them.

In 27 ABY, the Yuuzhan Vong tired of the resistance and unleashed a virus onto the world, instantly killing seven million of the planet's fifteen million inhabitants. The Rar sisters escaped with several thousand refugees.
